name: Mothim
flavorText:
It loves the honey of flowers
and steals honey collected by
COMBEE.

previous.name: Wormadam
previous.flavorText:
When BURMY evolved, its cloak
became a part of this Pokémon’s
body. The cloak is never shed.
previous.formDescription: Forms have different stats and movepools.  During evolution, Burmy's current cloak becomes Wormadam's form, and can no longer be changed.

next.name: Combee
next.flavorText:
A Pokémon formed by three others.
It busily carries sweet floral
honey to VESPIQUEN.

pokemon.name: Burmy
pokemon.flavorText:
To shelter itself from cold, wintry
winds, it covers itself with a cloak
made of twigs and leaves.
pokemon.formDescription: Forms only affect appearance, although they become permanent upon evolution.  Wild and newly-hatched Burmy are always in a Plant Cloak.  Burmy's cloak changes to match the terrain after a battle it participated in: Plant Cloak by default; Sandy Cloak in sandy or rocky areas, such as beaches, caves, and trails; and Trash Cloak in buildings.

pokemon.name: Mothim
pokemon.flavorText:
It loves the honey of flowers
and steals honey collected by
COMBEE.
